casebody.data:
Meyer Goodfriend vs. Henry Bodenheimer Real Estate Light and Power Company, a Corporation, &c. (March 18, 1921)

Boyce and Conrad, J. J., sitting.

Herbert H. Ward, Jr., (of Ward, Gray and Neary) for plaintiff. David J. Reinhardt for defendant. Superior Court for New Castle County,

March Term, 1921.

Sci. Fa. Sur. Mortgage, No. 126, January Term, 1921. *195Boyce, J.

Adhering to the decision of the court in Miller v. Hart, the affidavit of demand must be rejected and judgment for the plaintiff is refused.
